setActivity

public void setActivity(TypeFresh typeFresh)
Sets a new TypeFresh as this threads owner. This is important, since we need a reference to the new Activity when the screen rotates.

Parameters:
typeFresh - The new Activity whose ProgressDialog to use.

remount

public static boolean remount(int readwrite)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
Remounts /system read/write.

Parameters:
readwrite - one of READ_WRITE or READ_ONLY.
Returns:
boolean of whether it succeeded.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - If our su process has a problem.
java.io.IOException - If our su process has a problem.

systemLocation

protected static java.lang.String systemLocation()
                                          throws java.io.IOException
Locates the block on which /system is located and stores it in a static variable to ease computation.

Returns:
String of the block name, or null.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If we have a problem reading /etc/fstab.
